dc_title_s: HUD Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) Database
dc_description_s: PolicyMap downloaded the properties listed in HUD‘s LIHTC Database in July, 2018. HUD provided mapping coordinates for approximately 93% of these developments. The LIHTC program was created by the Tax Reform Act of 1986, and gives state and local LIHTC allocating agencies authority to issue tax credits for acquisition, rehabilitation or new construction of low income rental housing.
dc_creator_sm: US Department of Housing and Urban Development Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) Database
